Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in Great location”
Reviews.Author: Stamsters
Reviews.Content: stayed anastasia hotel august booked via website prices reasonable stayed 3 nights paid 130 aud night included lovely breakfast coffee taxi murano appreciated told own staff extremely friendly upgrade arrived complimentary bottle sparkling wine hotel fantastic location walking distance helped 6 half months pregnant time definately stay

Reviews.Content: nice neighbourhood fairly close san marco clean pretty elevator beeps soundproof guests hall loud breakfast served lobby selfservice set boring bread ham cheese types cerial milk yoghurt coffee automated machine actually coffee

Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel recently 3 star rated fabulous comfortable short walk san marco square grand canal attractions main island reception staff helpful polite highly recommend establishment ross griffiths australia

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”

Reviews.Content: scared staying reading awful reviews found hotel clean ideally located close piazza san marco stores restaurants public transportation system vaporetto 3 star hotel size queen bed clean bathtub bathroom welcomed fixture hotels showers hotel map guestroom floorand happy breakfast ok lot plan trip airport plan plenty time public transportation system plenty cash water taxi hotel staff helpful accurate giving options courteous professional stay hotel

Reviews.Content: ok bits bit location excellent barely minutes piazza san marco vaporetto stop rest staying hotel rome hotel florence rude shock checking greeted surly woman desk appeared annoyed interrupted whatever doing queries met brand rude indifference hotel offer free wifi unlike encountered italy offered help wi fi purchased consistently unhelpful response received outsourced cant help friend staying hotel change tee shirt guy front desk shockingly rude treated hooker hired afternoon woman serving breakfast looked shed spit cappuccino oh yeah single standards tiny bruises constantly walking furniture id venice incidentally beautiful cities ive stay hotel

Reviews.Content: stayed venice nights trip northern italy location paid anastasia satisfactory managed flood bathroom showerthe water force couldnt contain shower curtain main centrally located besides size restaurant hotel arrived late struggled food late venice shut night quiet

Reviews.Title: “Great staff & location... but sadly substandard”
Reviews.Author: WhiteGatesNewYork
Reviews.Content: ill start positives location delightful 201 overlooked lovely venetian square sunlight hit bathroom bedroom windows creating lovely atmosphere remember waking morning window distant sounds opera singing wafting special staff friendly polite helpful warm welcoming staying someones house didnt speak lot english chat locations five minute stroll st marks square negatives paying nearly 300 night money hotel wasnt par chief complaints 1 wasnt cleaned entire duration stay nights didnt attempt enter sign housekeeping whatsoever 2 wasnt particularly clean wasnt real attention detail instance handfuls peoples mismatching coat hangers left closet stained bath tub 3 real shower bathroom size tub wand ie shower head attached taps hook attach shower head wall 4 tv laptop screen 5 breakfast 930 bit 6 internet access available expensive

Reviews.Title: “Simply the best”
Reviews.Author: Golf_World_Traveller
Reviews.Content: originally booked 2 nights enjoyed venice hotel excellent staff nice helpful booked single expect venice importantly clean breakfast pretty basic fill morning hotel located centrally near san marco square amazingly pretty quiet slept nights hotel tucked main streets hard directions advance google map phone didnt direct exactly location definitely recommend looking nice hotel nice price expensive venice

Reviews.Title: “A gret little hotel in a great location”
